short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension that lets you roll up to 10 of any type of D&D dice at a time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple Chrome Extension that allows you to roll up to 10 of any of the dice used in D&D. When rolling more than one dice at a time, it will show you your total as well as what each die landed on.

Simply select the number of dice you want to roll at a time using the drop down menu, and then click on the dice you want to roll.
